channel.title: system administration on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in system administration on AshLogs

item.title: Postgres on Digital Ocean Droplet
item.description: Step-by-step guide to install and configure PostgreSQL on a Digital Ocean Ubuntu droplet, including user setup, remote access configuration, and network settings.

item.title: Uninstall System Apps in Android With ADB
item.description: Remove bloatware and system apps from Android devices using ADB (Android Debug Bridge). Step-by-step guide to uninstall unwanted manufacturer apps at user level without root access.

item.title: Linux Chmod command explained
item.description: Complete chmod tutorial: change file permissions in Linux using symbolic and octal notation. Master user, group, and other access controls.
